name: Slovenia
visaRequirements: Schengen Visa required for most non-EU citizens
languages: English widely spoken in tourist areas

about.description: Slovenia is a small but incredibly diverse country in Central Europe, known for its beautiful lakes, mountains, and charming towns. From the fairytale Lake Bled to the caves of Postojna, Slovenia is a paradise for nature lovers and adventurers.
highlights: Lake Bled and its island church
Spectacular caves like Postojna and Å kocjan
Julian Alps and Triglav National Park

travelTips.bestTimeToVisit: May to September for outdoor activities; December to March for winter sports
transportation: Car rental for exploring rural areas
Cycling is popular in many regions
culturalNotes: Slovenians are friendly and value sustainability
Tap water is safe to drink everywhere
Tipping is appreciated but not mandatory
